Use of InVid software: The expert used the InVid software to analyze the video and its authenticity. This software helps break down the video into individual frames and allows for reverse image searching to verify its origin and context.
Reverse image search: The expert conducted a reverse image search using Google to find any matches or similar images related to the video. This search did not yield any results, indicating that the video may not be widely available or previously reported.
Text analysis: The expert analyzed the accompanying message in Hindi that was being circulated along with the video. They specifically focused on the keywords "पुलिस को दौड़ा दौड़ा कर पीटा" (police being beaten while running) to search for related information. This led them to an article by Dainik Jagran, which provided further details about the incident.
Cross: referencing with news reports: The expert cross-referenced the information found in the Dainik Jagran article with other news reports to verify the authenticity of the claim. They found a report by The Pioneer stating that the video was from Ranchi, Jharkhand, and the clash occurred during a bike rally organized by the Bharatiya Janata Yuva Morcha (BJYM), the youth wing of the BJP. This information helped establish the actual location and context of the video, contradicting the claim that it happened in Karnataka.
